statements: SELECT * FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM ProductInformation WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, features FROM ProductInformation ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT specifications->'color' AS color FROM ProductInformation WHERE specifications->'weight' > '2kg';
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE features LIKE '%waterproof%';
SELECT * FROM ProductInformation WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductInformation WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, features FROM ProductInformation WHERE features ILIKE '%waterproof%' AND specifications->>'color' = 'black';
SELECT product_name, specifications->>'weight' AS weight, specifications->>'dimensions' AS dimensions FROM ProductInformation WHERE specifications->>'height' > 10;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM ProductInformation;
SELECT * FROM product_features
SELECT id, name FROM product_features WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, description FROM product_features WHERE id = 2
SELECT thumbnail_url FROM product_features WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, description FROM product_features WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, thumbnail_url FROM product_features WHERE name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT id, product_id, price, currency FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE currency = 'USD' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT id, name, description, thumbnail_url FROM product_features WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT feature_name, spec_name, value FROM features JOIN specifications ON features.product_id = specifications.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT p.name, s.spec_name, s.value FROM products p JOIN specifications s ON p.id = s.product_id;
SELECT f.feature_name, p.name FROM features f JOIN products p ON f.product_id = p.id;
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.value FROM products p LEFT JOIN specifications s ON p.id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductFeatures;
SELECT name, category FROM ProductFeatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ProductPricing WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT article_title, created_at FROM KnowledgeBase ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, category, description FROM ProductFeatures WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY spec_name DESC;
SELECT id, price, currency FROM ProductPricing WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT article_title, content, created_at FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;

SELECT pf.name AS product_name, ps.spec_name AS specification, pp.price AS unit_price, pp.currency AS unit_currency FROM ProductFeatures pf JOIN ProductSpecifications ps ON pf.id = ps.product_id JOIN ProductPricing pp ON pf.id = pp.product_id WHERE pp.price > 100 ORDER BY pp.price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductFeatures;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM ProductFeatures ORDER BY feature_id DESC;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT pricing_amount, currency FROM ProductPricing WHERE pricing_amount > 100 ORDER BY pricing_amount ASC;
SELECT product_id, review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT feature_id, feature_name, feature_description FROM ProductFeatures WHERE feature_id = 1;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY spec_name DESC;
SELECT pricing_amount, currency FROM ProductPricing WHERE currency = 'USD' AND product_id = 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE product_id = 2 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT image_url FROM ProductImages WHERE product_id = 4 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
